TopicTitle: CH-J3 Fly-By-Wire Avionics Hub should be in pods not command and control

Articles.Content: CH-J3 Fly-By-Wire Avionics Hub is basically the same as all the other unmanned control computers and shouldn't be put in the same group IMO.
It doesn't provide actual control for planes, though. It only adds SAS to already piloted craft.
Oh right, in that case I made a mistake and retract my suggestion.
You can probably make your own probe core avionics hub by copypasting the config of the avionics hub and messing around in the .cfg file.
